SEARCH
Package raytracer.shape

Class Shape

java.lang.Object
raytracer.shape.Shape
Direct Known Subclasses:
Plane, Sphere, Triangle
public abstract class Shape extends Object
Base class for renderable shapes. Holds material properties (diffuse, specular, shininess) and defines the intersection contract.

    • intersect

      public abstract Optional<Intersection> intersect(Ray ray)
      Computes intersection of this shape with the given ray.
      Parameters:
      ray - input ray in world space
      Returns:
      Optional containing the closest valid intersection, or empty if no hit
